text:
'THE OLDEST STATION IN THE NATION"
UNIVERSITY OF WISCONSIN
MADISON
November 26, 19^7
Mr. Raymond D. Cheydleur
Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Hello, Ray]
Doing a little spade work on the bacK: shelf, I have just
dug up your letter of September 11 about the Research Sminar
which was to be held in December* Is that still on the schedule?
Frankly, I haven*t done a doggone thing about lining up a
participant from Wisconsin. As I explained easier, we had a new
man who joined the journalism staff in September, and it was our
expectation that he would be assigned to the field of television
research, but that hasn*t happened yet. Bruce Westl^Sr continues to
supervise a couple TV studies along with other activities in
journalism, and I*m not sure he would be interested or able to
participate even if invited or urged to do so.
In order to avoid feeling corraletely ignorant of what's going
on, 1*11 appreciate it if you'll bring me up to date. Is there to
be a seminar? Has it been postponed? Or what? Westly may even
have been negotiating with you separately but I've been too
embarrassed to mention the matter without knowing more about it
myself. So, help a guy out, will you, please?
Cordially,
H. B, McCarty
Director
